import axios from 'axios' import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import RecipesContext from '../ourContext' const AddRJ = () => { const myrecipe=useContext(RecipesContext).myrecipe const setmyrecipe=useContext(RecipesContext).setmyrecipe const login=useContext(RecipesContext).login const add=()=>{ let y=myrecipe axios.put('http://localhost:1234/Recipes/addRecipe',y).then(l=>{setmyrecipe(l.data)},alert("Added successfully")) } return (

) } export default AddRJ
